name: Snack Challenge
description: Tasty and crazy challenges with food and drinks. Mix, sip, and experiment!

dares.title: Blind Taste Tester
dares.action: ${c_player}, with eyes covered, taste a spoonful of whatever ${r_player} gives you and guess the ingredient.

dares.title: Surprise Sandwich
dares.action: ${c_player}, make a sandwich from three random items and eat it.

dares.title: Spice Shot
dares.action: ${c_player}, drink a sip of water with a pinch of hot pepper. No grimacing!

dares.title: Group Spread
dares.action: Everyone spreads a random sauce on bread and eats. Anyone who winces drinks.

dares.title: Salty Dessert
dares.action: ${c_player}, sprinkle salt on half a cookie and eat it silently.

dares.title: Cocktail Roulette
dares.action: ${c_player}, mix two different drinks chosen by ${r_player} and take a sip.

dares.title: Crunch Echo
dares.action: ${c_player}, crunch any snack loudly and say ‘delicious’ three times.

dares.title: Cheese Smile
dares.action: ${c_player}, bite a piece of cheese into a smile shape and show it to everyone.

dares.title: Fridge Combo
dares.action: ${c_player}, mix three fridge drinks in one glass and chug without stopping.

dares.title: Everyone’s a Gourmet
dares.action: Each person eats a spoon of ketchup + mayo. Anyone who refuses drinks.

dares.title: Fruit Rap
dares.action: ${c_player}, wrap a mandarin with a napkin like a microphone and rap a short verse about food.

dares.title: Fork Critic
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend you’re judging a fancy dish while tasting a French fry.

dares.title: Cucumber Giggles
dares.action: ${c_player}, bite a cucumber and laugh for 10 seconds without swallowing.

dares.title: Wild Toast
dares.action: ${c_player}, invent an absurd toast about kefir and say it raising a glass of water.

dares.title: Chocolate + Chips
dares.action: ${c_player}, eat a piece of chocolate together with a chip in one bite.

dares.title: Water Sommeliers
dares.action: Everyone sips water describing the ‘after‑taste’. Fail → drink.

dares.title: Porridge Clap
dares.action: ${c_player}, slap a bowl of porridge (real or imaginary) and say ‘masterpiece’.

dares.title: Spicy Dare
dares.action: ${c_player}, eat a chili slice. You may swallow a drink only after 30 s.

dares.title: Friendship Sandwich
dares.action: Make a shared sandwich: each adds one ingredient then take turns biting.

dares.title: Reverse Roll
dares.action: ${c_player}, skip the rice! Wrap a slice of bread with nori and eat it.

dares.title: Foamy ’Stache
dares.action: ${c_player}, take a sip of a fizzy drink and photo your foam moustache.

dares.title: Juice‑Milk Mix
dares.action: ${c_player}, mix juice with a little milk, drink, describe the taste in one word.

dares.title: Everyone’s a Bartender
dares.action: Each names a weird cocktail ingredient. ${r_player} mixes and drinks.

dares.title: Spoon Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, grip a spoon between your teeth and dance for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Flip the Glass
dares.action: ${c_player}, drink water holding the glass by the very bottom with two fingers.

dares.title: Egg Question
dares.action: ${c_player}, down a raw egg or take two big gulps of your drink.

dares.title: Fruit Ring‑a‑Ring
dares.action: Everyone grabs a fruit and spins around the table for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Sugar Snow
dares.action: ${c_player}, pour a pinch of sugar on your tongue and say ‘snowflake’.

dares.title: Spice Sniffer
dares.action: ${c_player}, guess a spice by smell—the one ${r_player} picks.

dares.title: Super Smoothie
dares.action: ${c_player}, name 4 ingredients for the perfect smoothie. Each miss → a gulp.

dares.title: Everyone’s a Chef
dares.action: Invent a dish from ‘whatever’s here’. ${r_player} crowns the best; others drink.

dares.title: Mayo Mastiff
dares.action: ${c_player}, eat a teaspoon of mayo without a face.

dares.title: Chew Loud
dares.action: ${c_player}, crunch a chip louder than everyone for 5 s. Too quiet? extra gulp.

dares.title: Unsweet Dessert
dares.action: ${c_player}, sprinkle any dessert with salt and eat it.

dares.title: Water Tasters
dares.action: Describe plain water like fine wine. Dullest description drinks.

dares.title: Onion Braveheart
dares.action: ${c_player}, bite raw onion. Refuse → two gulps.

dares.title: Chocolate + Salt
dares.action: ${c_player}, dip a chocolate piece in salt and eat it.

dares.title: Eat the Rainbow
dares.action: ${c_player}, eat five foods of different colours in a row.

dares.title: Buddy Cocktail
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player} each mix a drink for the other and swap.

dares.title: Pepper + Milk
dares.action: ${c_player}, wash down a chili bite with milk and say ‘easy’.

dares.title: Hands‑Free Salad
dares.action: ${c_player}, eat a piece of salad without using your hands.

dares.title: Everyone’s a Barista
dares.action: Describe the perfect coffee taste. Dullest person drinks.

dares.title: Soup Story
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell a short fairy‑tale about soup starring ${r_player}.

dares.title: Patty King
dares.action: ${c_player}, act out a hamburger ad so everyone wants one.

dares.title: Food Tower
dares.action: ${c_player}, build a 6‑crouton tower. If it collapses—you drink.

dares.title: Gourmet Critics
dares.action: Rate water 1–10. Anyone giving 1 or 10 drinks.

dares.title: Honey + Lemon
dares.action: ${c_player}, eat a spoon of honey then bite a lemon immediately.

dares.title: Striped Drink
dares.action: ${c_player}, layer three liquids into a drink and down it.

dares.title: Cheese Test
dares.action: ${c_player}, blind‑taste two cheeses and guess which is which.

dares.title: Ice‑Cream Shamans
dares.action: Name the wildest ice‑cream flavour you’d try. Hesitate → drink.
